sqlMap.update: /* smDtaGnlSttusDAO.updateSmDtaGnlSttus */ /* 집계_자료_일반_현황 수정 */ UPDATE TN_SM_DTA_GNL_STTUS SET SRVY_NO = #SRVY_NO# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_번호 */ , SRVY_YEAR = #SRVY_YEAR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_년도 */ , ROUTE_CODE = #ROUTE_CODE# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.노선_코드 */ , DIRECT_CODE = #DIRECT_CODE# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.행선_코드 */ , TRACK = #TRACK# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.차로 */ , STRTPT = #STRTPT# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.시점 */ , ENDPT = #ENDPT# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종점 */ , IRI_VAL = #IRI_VAL# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종단평탄성_값 */ , POTHOLE_CR = #POTHOLE_CR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.포트홀_균열 */ , RD_VAL = #RD_VAL# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_값 */ , VRTCAL_CR = #VRTCAL_CR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향_균열 */ , HRZNTAL_CR = #HRZNTAL_CR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향_균열 */ , CNSTRCT_JOINT_CR = #CNSTRCT_JOINT_CR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.시공_줄눈_균열 */ , TRTS_BAC_CR = #TRTS_BAC_CR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등_균열 */ , PTCHG_CR = #PTCHG_CR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.패칭_균열 */ , CR_VAL = #CR_VAL# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면손상값 */ , CR_IDX = #CR_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면손상지수 */ , RD_IDX = #RD_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형지수 */ , RI_IDX = #RI_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.평탄성_지수 */ , CNTL_DFECT = #CNTL_DFECT# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.지배_결함 */ , SRVY_KND = #SRVY_KND# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_종류 */ , SRVY_MT = #SRVY_MT# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_월 */ , FRMULA_NO = #FRMULA_NO# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수식_번호 */ , TRNSPORT_QY = #TRNSPORT_QY# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.교통_량 */ , CR_GRAD = #CR_GRAD# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면손상_등급 */ , RD_GRAD = #RD_GRAD# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_등급 */ , IRI_GRAD = #IRI_GRAD# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종단평탄성_등급 */ , UPDUSR_NO = #UPDUSR_NO# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수정자_번호 */ , UPDT_DT = NOW() /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수정_일시 */ , BLOCK_CR = #BLOCK_CR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열 */ , CR_LT = #CR_LT# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.균열_길이 */ , CR_WID = #CR_WID# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.균열_폭 */ , NHPCI = #NHPCI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.NHPCI */ , SPI = #SPI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.SPI */ , XCR = #XCR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.NHPCI_균열 */ , RCI = #RCI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면_조도_지수 */ , SCR = #SCR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면_상태_지수 */ , AC_LOW = #AC_LOW# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_LOW */ , AC_MED = #AC_MED# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_MED */ , AC_HI = #AC_HI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_HI */ , LC_LOW = #LC_LOW# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_LOW */ , LC_MED = #LC_MED# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_MED */ , LC_HI = #LC_HI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_HI */ , TC_LOW = #TC_LOW# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_LOW */ , TC_MED = #TC_MED# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_MED */ , TC_HI = #TC_HI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_HI */ , AC_IDX = #AC_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_지수 */ , LC_IDX = #LC_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_지수 */ , TC_IDX = #TC_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_지수 */ , PTCHG_IDX = #PTCHG_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.패칭_지수 */ , RD_LOW = #RD_LOW# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_LOW */ , RD_MED = #RD_MED# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_MED */ , RD_HI = #RD_HI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_HI */ , BLOCK_CR_LOW = #BLOCK_CR_LOW# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열_LOW */ , BLOCK_CR_MED = #BLOCK_CR_MED# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열_MED */ , BLOCK_CR_HI = #BLOCK_CR_HI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열_HI */ , POTHOLE_IDX = #POTHOLE_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.포트홀_지수 */ , DMG_CUZ_CLMT = #DMG_CUZ_CLMT# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.파손_원인_기후 */ , DMG_CUZ_VMTC = #DMG_CUZ_VMTC# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.파손_원인_교통량 */ , DMG_CUZ_ETC = #DMG_CUZ_ETC# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.파손_원인_기타 */ , GPCI = #GPCI# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.GPCI */ , PC_GRAD = #PC_GRAD# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.포장상태등급 */ , BC_IDX = #BC_IDX# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭균열_지수 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND SM_NO = #SM_NO# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.집계_번호 */
sqlMap.delete: /* smDtaGnlSttusDAO.deleteSmDtaGnlSttus */ /* 집계_자료_일반_현황 삭제 */ UPDATE TN_SM_DTA_GNL_STTUS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.삭제_여부 */ , USE_AT = 'N' , UPDUSR_NO = #UPDUSR_NO# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수정자_번호 */ , UPDT_DT = NOW() /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수정_일시 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND SM_NO = #SM_NO# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.집계_번호 */
sqlMap.select: /* smDtaGnlSttusDAO.selectSmDtaGnlSttus */ /* 집계_자료_일반_현황 조회 */ WITH LASTLIST AS ( SELECT tnsmdtagnlsttus.SM_NO /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.집계_번호 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.SRVY_NO /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_번호 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.SRVY_YEAR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_년도 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.ROUTE_CODE /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.노선_코드 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.DIRECT_CODE /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.행선_코드 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.TRACK /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.차로 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.STRTPT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.시점 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.ENDPT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종점 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.IRI_VAL /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종단평탄성_값 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.POTHOLE_CR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.포트홀_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RD_VAL /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_값 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.VRTCAL_CR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.HRZNTAL_CR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CNSTRCT_JOINT_CR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.시공_줄눈_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.TRTS_BAC_CR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.PTCHG_CR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.패칭_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CR_VAL /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면손상값 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CR_IDX /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면손상지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RD_IDX AS RD_IDX/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RI_IDX /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.평탄성_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CNTL_DFECT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.지배_결함 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.SRVY_KND /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_종류 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.SRVY_MT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.조사_월 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.FRMULA_NO /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수식_번호 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.TRNSPORT_QY /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.교통_량 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CR_GRAD /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면손상_등급 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RD_GRAD /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_등급 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.IRI_GRAD /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종단평탄성_등급 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.DELETE_AT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.삭제_여부 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.USE_AT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.사용_여부 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CRTR_NO /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.생성자_번호 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CREAT_DT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.생성_일시 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.UPDUSR_NO /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수정자_번호 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.UPDT_DT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.수정_일시 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.BLOCK_CR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CR_LT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.균열_길이 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.CR_WID /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.균열_폭 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.NHPCI /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.NHPCI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.SPI /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.SPI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.XCR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.NHPCI_균열 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RCI AS RCI/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면_조도_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.SCR /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.표면_상태_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.AC_LOW /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_LOW */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.AC_MED/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_MED */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.AC_HI /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_HI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.LC_LOW /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_LOW */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.LC_MED /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_MED */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.LC_HI /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_HI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.TC_LOW /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_LOW */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.TC_MED /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_MED */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.TC_HI /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_HI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.AC_IDX AS AC_IDX/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.거북등균열_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.LC_IDX AS LC_IDX/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.종방향균열_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.TC_IDX/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.횡방향균열_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.PTCHG_IDX AS PTCHG_IDX/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.패칭_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RD_LOW /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_LOW */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RD_MED /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_MED */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.RD_HI /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.소성변형_HI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.BLOCK_CR_LOW/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열_LOW */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.BLOCK_CR_MED /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열_MED */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.BLOCK_CR_HI /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭_균열_HI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.POTHOLE_IDX AS POTHOLE_IDX/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.포트홀_지수 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.DMG_CUZ_CLMT /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.파손_원인_기후 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.DMG_CUZ_VMTC /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.파손_원인_교통량 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.DMG_CUZ_ETC /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.파손_원인_기타 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.GPCI AS GPCI/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.GPCI */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.PC_GRAD /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.포장상태등급 */ , tnsmdtagnlsttus.BC_IDX AS BC_IDX/* 집계_자료_일반_현황.블럭균열_지수 */ , TO_NUMBER(tnsmdtagnlsttus.ROUTE_CODE) AS ROAD_NO_VAL , road.ROAD_NAME AS ROAD_NM , ( SELECT tccode.CODE_NM FROM TC_CODE tccode WHERE tccode.CODE_VAL = tnsmdtagnlsttus.CNTL_DFECT ) AS CNTL_DFECT_NM , ( SELECT code.CODE_NM FROM TC_CODE code WHERE code.CODE_VAL = road.ROAD_GRAD ) AS ROAD_GRAD , ( SELECT tcdept.LOWEST_DEPT_NM FROM TC_DEPT tcdept WHERE tcdept.DEPT_CODE = sect.DEPT_CODE ) AS DEPT_CODE , ( SELECT tccode.CODE_NM FROM TC_CODE tccode WHERE tccode.CODE_VAL = sect.CELL_TYPE ) AS CELL_TYPE , ( SELECT tccode.CODE_NM FROM TC_CODE tccode WHERE tccode.CODE_VAL = sect.VMTC_GRAD ) AS VMTC_GRAD , ( SELECT n3a.NAME FROM N3A_G0100000 n3a WHERE SUBSTR(n3a.BJCD, 0, 5) = sect.ADM_CODE ) AS ADM_CODE , sect.CELL_ID , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tnsmdtagnlsttus.AC_IDX, 0, 0, sect.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', 0) AC_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tnsmdtagnlsttus.BC_IDX, 0, 0, sect.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', 0) BC_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tnsmdtagnlsttus.LC_IDX, 0, 0, sect.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', 0) LC_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tnsmdtagnlsttus.PTCHG_IDX, 0, 0, sect.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', 0) PTCHG_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tnsmdtagnlsttus.POTHOLE_IDX, 0, 0, sect.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', 0) POT_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tnsmdtagnlsttus.RD_IDX, 0, 0, sect.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', 0) RD_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tnsmdtagnlsttus.RCI, 0, 0, sect.CELL_TYPE, 'RCI', 0) RCI_RATE FROM TN_SM_DTA_GNL_STTUS tnsmdtagnlsttus INNER JOIN CELL_SECT sect ON tnsmdtagnlsttus.DIRECT_CODE = sect.DIRECT_CODE AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.TRACK = sect.TRACK AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.ROUTE_CODE = sect.ROUTE_CODE AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.STRTPT = sect.STRTPT AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.ENDPT = sect.ENDPT LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_ROUTE_INFO road ON road.ROAD_NO = tnsmdtagnlsttus.ROUTE_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.SRVY_YEAR = #SRVY_YEAR# /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.집계_번호 */ AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.DELETE_AT = 'N' /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.삭제_여부 */ AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.USE_AT = 'Y' /* 집계_자료_일반_현황.사용_여부 */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT 't' FROM TN_SM_DTA_GNL_STTUS sub WHERE sub.SM_NO = #SM_NO# AND sub.USE_AT = 'Y' AND sub.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND sub.ROUTE_CODE = tnsmdtagnlsttus.ROUTE_CODE AND sub.DIRECT_CODE = tnsmdtagnlsttus.DIRECT_CODE AND sub.TRACK = tnsmdtagnlsttus.TRACK AND sub.STRTPT = tnsmdtagnlsttus.STRTPT AND sub.ENDPT = tnsmdtagnlsttus.ENDPT ) ) , RESULTLIST AS ( SELECT tb.* , CASE WHEN tb.SCR = 0 THEN (tb.AC_RATE + tb.BC_RATE + tb.LC_RATE + tb.PTCHG_RATE + tb.POT_RATE + tb.RD_RATE) ELSE 0 SUM_RATE FROM LASTLIST tb ) SELECT tb.* , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tb.AC_IDX, 0, 0, tb.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', tb.SUM_RATE) AC_RDUCT_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tb.BC_IDX, 0, 0, tb.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', tb.SUM_RATE) BC_RDUCT_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tb.LC_IDX, 0, 0, tb.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', tb.SUM_RATE) LC_RDUCT_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tb.PTCHG_IDX, 0, 0, tb.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', tb.SUM_RATE) PTCHG_RDUCT_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tb.POTHOLE_IDX, 0, 0, tb.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', tb.SUM_RATE) POT_RDUCT_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tb.RD_IDX, 0, 0, tb.CELL_TYPE, 'SCR', tb.SUM_RATE) RD_RDUCT_RATE , FN_GET_GPCI_RDUCT_RATE(tb.RCI, 0, 0, tb.CELL_TYPE, 'RCI', tb.SUM_RATE) RCI_RDUCT_RATE , RCI_RATE RCI_RDUCT_RATE FROM RESULTLIST tb INNER JOIN CELL_SECT sect ON sect.CELL_ID = tb.CELL_ID

/* smDtaGnlSttusDAO.selectSmDtaGnlSttusYearListByCellId */ /* 최소구간 조사년도 목록 조회 */ SELECT DISTINCT SRVY_YEAR SRVY_YEAR FROM TN_SM_DTA_GNL_STTUS tnsmdtagnlsttus INNER JOIN CELL_SECT cellsect ON cellsect.ROUTE_CODE = tnsmdtagnlsttus.ROUTE_CODE AND cellsect.DIRECT_CODE = tnsmdtagnlsttus.DIRECT_CODE AND cellsect.TRACK = tnsmdtagnlsttus.TRACK AND cellsect.STRTPT = tnsmdtagnlsttus.STRTPT AND cellsect.ENDPT = tnsmdtagnlsttus.ENDPT AND cellsect.CELL_ID = #CELL_ID# WHERE 1 = 1 AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.DELETE_AT = 'N' /* 최소_구간_조사_자료.삭제_여부 */ AND tnsmdtagnlsttus.USE_AT = 'Y' /* 최소_구간_조사_자료.사용_여부 */
ORDER BY tnsmdtagnlsttus.SRVY_YEAR
